A keyboard that adapts to the user's typing style and preferences, using machine learning algorithms to learn and improve over time.
A keyboard with a built-in AI assistant, capable of providing real-time language translation, grammar suggestions, and even writing suggestions.
A keyboard that can generate music, using a combination of machine learning algorithms and sensors to detect the user's hand movements and translate them into musical notes.
A keyboard that can project holographic images and videos, using a combination of augmented reality and projection technology.
A keyboard that can generate 3D models and virtual environments, using a combination of machine learning algorithms and sensors to detect the user's hand movements and translate them into 3D objects
